text: Sano wachaweje mwa jenumanja ni kulekaga achiwammakwao, aleche wasiya wakwamba achiwammakwaowo wanti apedwe ichindu yakwakamuchisya yakwana chaka chantundu mwangali koposyedwa (mmajumba ga achiwammakwao), nambo naga akukopoka (achimisyene), chipawe pangali ulemwa kukwenu mu ichindu yalitendele achimisyene yakwilanila (ni malamusi ga Dini), sano Allah ni Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
